```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
```

## Getting the data

```{r}
#| label: get_data_function

get_data <- function(date, dataset_name){
  
  df <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(date)
  
  df[[dataset_name]]

}
```

```{r}
#| label: getting_data
#| include: false

edible_plants <- get_data("2026-02-03", "edible_plants")
```
